issue.title: First-class support for Laravel framework
issue.body:
In v2.2 Annotated Container released support for using the Laravel Illuminate container. However, this does not include full integration with the Laravel framework. This is an important milestone for the library, to achieve any kind of real traction we need to support Laravel and Symfony with an out-of-the-box, turnkey solution.

To integrate completely with Laravel we need to implement a custom [Service Provider](https://laravel.com/docs/12.x/providers) that will wire up the provided container with what is declared with Annotated Container. Much of this is already accomplished with the `IlluminateContainerFactory`. There are several nuances to implementing this provider that deviates from our expected use cases.

The biggest change is that we don't really need the resultant `AnnotatedContainer` implementation that is created at the end of the process. The wiring needs to happen to an existing Laravel container. This means we only need parts of the overall process for creating an Annotated Container. To do this efficiently we will need to implement portions of the Bootstrapping process.

payload.description: A testing extension for cspray/database-testing to setup a database for testing with PHPUnit

release.body:
## What's Changed
* Fix use statements in examples by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/database-testing-phpunit/pull/1

## New Contributors
* @cspray made their first contribution in https://github.com/cspray/database-testing-phpunit/pull/1

release.body:
## What's Changed
* Make library framework-agnostic by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/database-testing/pull/19
* Prepare for 0.5 release, adjust ConnectionAdapter::selectAll to retur by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/database-testing/pull/20
* Bug/fix connection adapter test case by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/database-testing/pull/21


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cspray/database-testing/compare/0.4.0...0.5.0
release.short_description_html:
What's Changed

  • Make library framework-agnostic by @cspray in #19
  • Prepare for 0.5 release, adjust ConnectionAdapter::selectAll to retur by @cspray in #20

payload.description: Framework-agnostic, low-level library to setup a database for automated testing
